entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 7:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
